name: Spruce
summary: A simple animation library that tries to do everything for you.
description: Spruce is a very small, lightweight animation library that hopes to handle all of the complications of animations for you. So many developers use standard animations because they are easy and quick to use. With Spruce, developers will be able to create complex animations hopefully with just one line of code. These animations can include variations on fading, scale, spin, and many more. A key component of Spruce is that it is entirely customizable. If we don't have the exact animation you are looking to build, subclass one of our types and everything will just work.
